headline: Extole Collaborates with Jack Henry to help financial institutions drive new accounts, deposits, and digital engagement with personalized Refer a Friend programs
summary: Extole, a customer acquisition and engagement platform, announced today that their Refer-a-Friend solution is now accessible through the Jack Henry™ digital banking platform.
